CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1967, pg. 4, reads: "Labor's Highest Award - was presented A. Phillip [Philip] Randolph on Labor Day in Civic Arena by Bishop John J. Wright. Others watching the touching ceremony are Bishop Frederick Newell of the Methodist Church and Bishop Gordon Howard of the EUB Church... - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Labor Day celebration honoring A. Philip Randolph, with Bishop John J. Wright presenting trophy to Randolph, with Bishop Frederick Newell and Bishop Gordon Howard standing on either side, and possibly Father Bosco on far right, in front of Civic Arena, Lower  Hill District
CatSubject_tab: Civic Arena (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Hill District (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Clergy--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Randolph, A. Philip (Asa Philip), 1889-Priests--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
